metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20363 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: LibRaw::raw2image in libraw_cxx.cpp in LibRaw 0.19.1 has a NULL pointerdereference.

criterions.comment: ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
